summary:
Multilanguage
fixes the lights flickering bug of the glorious Dawnstar Sanctuary Overhaul mod.
descriptionHtml:
Standalone just install and be happy.

Fixes a bug of the lorefriendly Dawnstar Santuary Overhaul mod:
Barnman your mod is awesome!
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10599

Fixes:
no more lights flickering
I think I\'ve added a small chest for gems aswell

the rest was done by the original mod:
Crypta reopened
2 nice Traders added
and more..

Should work in German, and hopefully in every other language aswell.
Please respond if thats not the case.

Recommended mods:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/9752
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6535


Beste Grüße!
author: Grovemann
